changes.description: Massive BloodLife update with performance upgrades, new systems, and fun activities!
changes.title: BloodLife 1.0

changes.description: Big optimization pass on all clothing to help with performance and reduce overall city lag. Duplicates removed and optimized clothing is now under 'textures/'.
changes.title: CLOTHING UPDATE 1.0

changes.description: MLOs and vehicles tuned and optimized for better performance across the city.
changes.title: MLO & VEHICLE OPTIMIZATION

changes.description: Painkillers (for civilians) and IFAKs (for police) can now be used to stop bleeding and stabilize injuries.
changes.title: INJURY SYSTEM + HEALING ITEMS

changes.description: Fully redesigned notification system to better match the custom BloodLife UI style.
changes.title: NOTIFICATION SYSTEM

changes.description: Progress bars have been completely redesigned to better align with the BloodLife look and feel.
changes.title: PROGRESS BAR SYSTEM

changes.description: New loading screen with immersive visual design customized for BloodLife.
changes.title: LOADING SCREEN

changes.description: New custom pause menu designed to fit the theme and layout of BloodLife.
changes.title: PAUSE MENU

changes.description: Weapons now visibly stay on your back while reloading skins, driving, or switching weapons.
changes.title: WEAPON ON BACK SYSTEM

changes.description: Vehicle contracts now handled at PDM to avoid scams when selling cars.
changes.title: VEHICLE SELLING CONTRACTS

changes.description: New optimized vehicle key system that works reliably across all vehicle types.
changes.title: VEHICLE KEY SYSTEM

changes.description: Business crafting system and boss menu have been streamlined for better ease of use for business owners.
changes.title: BUSINESS CRAFTING/BOSS MENU

players.description: GSF has dominated the streets this month with strategic takeovers, relentless turf control, and a reputation that leaves their enemies second-guessing every move. Feared, respected, and always a step ahead  they have earned their spot at the top.
players.name: GSF

players.description: Phantom has set the standard this month with sharp investigative work, unmatched professionalism, and relentless pursuit of justice. From undercover ops to high-stakes busts, Hes proven why he's a key player in the LSPD and more than earned his spot as Police Officer of the Month.
players.name: Phantom

players.description: Rustys Donut 753 has gone above and beyond this month, setting a new standard for excellence in service and quality. Through teamwork, leadership, and dedication, we’ve continued to exceed expectations and drive success. We’re proud of our achievements and excited for what’s ahead.
players.name: Rustys Donut 753
